title: Kiribathgoda
details:
9.5 perches Land Available for sale in kiribathgoda town Area.
High Residential area and good neighborhood.
close to Viharamahadevi school, food city, KFC,Police Station ,Arpico, Keels super, Thilakawardana Super center,Hospital,pizza hut,kiribathgoda YMBA.
30 feet wide access road.
Rs775000.00 PP
negotiation.
